messages.dryRunPassed: Pre-check passed! YAML configuration is valid and can be safely applied.
messages.missingParams: Missing required parameters: Cluster ID or workload type

confirm.leaveDesc: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
confirm.applyYamlDesc: Are you sure you want to apply this YAML configuration? This will create resources in the cluster.
confirm.resetDesc: Are you sure you want to reset YAML content? Unsaved changes will be lost.

alert.unsavedChangesDesc: Remember to save your changes, or click the reset button to restore original content.

preview.title: YAML Preview Result
preview.validationSuccessDesc: YAML format is correct and can be safely applied to the cluster.

diff.title: Confirm Changes - YAML Diff
diff.reviewChanges: Please review the following changes carefully
diff.reviewChangesDesc: Left side shows original configuration, right side shows modified configuration. Click 'Confirm Update' to apply changes after review.
